analysis: The project is a website about black holes with a focus on animated slides and pages. The current theme needs to be enhanced to reflect a cosmic, dark, and animated aesthetic that aligns with the black hole topic. The existing files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that need to be updated to create a visually engaging and interactive experience.

improvements.description: Update the CSS to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Use Egyptian-themed color palettes and UI elements to enhance the visual appeal.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html.
